data.title: Chinese Celebrity Couples Who Are Dating, Married, Or Have Broken Up
data.meta_description: Roy Chiu & Rainie Yang - broken up: More pictures of Roy Chiu here. I think that Rainie Yang's ex-boyfriend is so cute. Hacken Lee and Emily Lo - married and have a son name Ryan: Max Zhang & Ada Choi - married couple. Ada Choi used to date Taiwanese actor and singer, Nicky Wu. The couple...
data.text:
Roy Chiu & Rainie Yang - broken up:

More pictures of Roy Chiu here. I think that Rainie Yang's ex-boyfriend is so cute.

Hacken Lee and Emily Lo - married and have a son name Ryan:

Max Zhang & Ada Choi - married couple. Ada Choi used to date Taiwanese actor and singer, Nicky Wu. The couple broke up in 2002 and Nicky Wu married Ma Ya Shu in December 2006.

Marco Ngai and Joyce Tang both broke up. Joyce Tang was rumoured to be dating Derek Kwok and Marco Ngai is currently married to a 20-year-old college student.

Gregory Lee & Shirley Yeung - dating:

Dicky Cheung & Jess Zhang are officially married. She had an 8 months pregnant miscarriage. The baby was supposed to be due on March 2008. She and Dicky Cheung starred in "Duke of Mount Deer 2000" and have dated for 8 years.

Dicky Cheung and Jessica Hsuan have dated in the past and broke up.

Leon Lai & Gaile Lok - dating:

One of Leon Lai's most famous rumoured ex-girlfriends is Shu Qi.

Carina Lau & Tony Leung tied the knot last year.

Kay Tse & Louis Cheung - married and have a son (Kay Tse is wearing a green dress and Louis Cheung is the one wearing the white coat):

Cecilia Cheung and Nicholas Tse - married and have a son name Lucas. Nicholas Tse used to date Faye Wong.

Daniel Wu and Lisa S. - dating (Daniel Wu's ex-girlfriend is Maggie Q):

Natalie Tong and Amigo Chui - broken up:

Some pictures of Natalie Tong:

Nick Cheung and Esther Kwan - married and have a daughter name Brittany:

Kenix Kwok and Frankie Lam - married:

Mandy Cho and Stephen Huynh - rumored to be dating:

Selina Li and Patrick Tang - officially dating (Patrick Tang's ex-girlfriend is Marsha Yuen):

Beatrice Xu Wei Lun dated Lee Wei and broke up. She also dated Vic Zhou a.k.a. Zai Zai from F4 or JVKV. That was before he dated Barbie Hsu a.k.a. Da S. Xu Wei Lun died from a car accident on January 28, 2007 at the age of 28.

Her ex-boyfriends Lee Wei who is a Taiwanese singer and actor and Vic Zhou from F4 or JVKV.

Barbie Hsu a.k.a. Da 'S' and Vic Zhou broke up.

Peter Ho admitted his secret love for Da S.

Jay Chou and Patty Hou - broken up:

Jay Chou's other ex-girlfriend is Jolin Tsai. An article from asianbite that reveals their break-up. Jay Chou dated Jolin Tsai before Patty Hou.

There are others that I can think of, but I cannot find pics of them.

There's also Anita Yuen and Julian Cheung (married couple with a son name Morton), Liza Wang and Law Ka Ying (married couple), Amy Kwok and Sean Lau (married couple), Li Ya Peng and Faye Wong (married couple and have 1 daughter), Athena Chu and Paul Wong (dating), Cindy Au and Roger Kwok (married couple with a son name Brad), Raymond Cho and Elaine Chiang (married couple - Elaine Chiang is the daughter of actor, John Chiang; they have a son name Brandon), Jamie Chik and Michael Miu (married couple with a son and a daughter), Jerry Lam and Lily Hong (married couple with 2 sons), Karen Mok and Stephen Fung (broken up), George Lam and Sally Yeh (married couple), Eric Choi and Halina Tam (married couple - Eric Choi is the ex-boyfriend of Anne Heung).

Visit my other threads titled Former Miss Hong Kongs In The Hong Kong Entertainment Industry & Hong Kong Celebrity Families.

Will add more later.

wasn't there already a thread for this?

i swear i saw it before =\

Yup, there was a thread for this already. I posted it last year. It has old information and I want to update with current information. It doesn't hurt to post it again.

Here's more that I would like to add:

Ekin Cheng and Yoyo Mung are rumored to be getting married. Ekin Cheng's ex-girlfriends are Maggie Siu and Gigi Leung.

Simon Yam and Qi Qi are married and have a daughter name Ella. Simon Yam is a Hong Kong actor and his wife is an international model.

Qi Qi:

Simon Yam:

Cass Pang and Jan Lam - married and they have two daughters (Jan Lam is the older brother of Jerry Lam):

Jacky Cheung and May Lo - married and have 2 daughters:

Edmond So from Grasshoppers and Winnie Lau - married and have 2 daughters:

Natalie Wong was Louis Koo's ex-girlfriend.

Former Miss Hong Kong runner-up and actress extraordinaire, Noel Leung Siu Bing and fellow actor husband, Chan Ka Fai. I believe they met through Christian group, "House of Artists" and have been happily married for several years.

Credits: jaynestars

Some pictures of Noel Leung, the wife of Gary Chan. I really miss seeing her in TVB dramas.

An old article dated back to 2006:

Hong Kong actor Benny Chan and actress Charmaine Sheh have ended their four-year relationship.

The paparazzi snapped photos of Benny Chan getting intimate with younger females in various bars in Shanghai, where he is filming the new TV series "Ghost Stories."

Charmaine Sheh was recently crowned head actress at Hong Kong's TVB TV station. The added pressure of her work and news of Benny's affair led to their break-up.

When asked about his relationship with Charmaine, Benny reluctantly said they are just good friends. Charmaine Sheh said Benny Chan's private life is now none of her business.

Credits: China Scope

Sammi Cheng and Andy Hui - broken up:

Sammi Cheng:

Andy Hui:

Since 1999, Jet Li has been married to Nina Li Chi (born Li Zhi), a Shanghai-born, Hong Kong-based actress. He has two children with her as well, Jane (born 2000) and Jada (born 2002).

Credits to Wikipedia

Matt Yeung and Sharon Chan dated in the past and broke up.

Sharon Chan:

Matt Yeung - he's the one in the red shirt:

Miriam Yeung and Ronald Cheng - broken up (heard Ronald Cheng dated Charlene Choi or ah Sa from Twins):

Ah Sa from Twins:

Vin Choi and Yoyo Chen - broken up (they met on 2004's "Sunshine Heartbeat" and dated shortly afterwards). An article from jaynestars that confirmed that they broke up. Yoyo Chen is currently dating Vincent Wong.

Margaret Chung and Joey Leung - broke up. Joey Leung cheated on Margaret Chung with former Miss Hong Kong contestant, Queenie Chu which resulted in the break-up. Queenie Chu won 2nd place from the 2005 Miss Hong Kong pageant.

Ruby Lin and Jimmy Lin - broke up:

Vanness Wu from JVKV or F4 and Vivian Hsu - broken up:

Show Luo or Alan Luo and Selina Ren from S.H.E. are rumoured to be dating.

Will add more later.

Credits: asianfanatics & google

Faye and Real from the Taiwanese band called F.I.R. are dating. He has proposed to her on Christmas 2007.

Rainie Yang admitted that she dated Alien Huang Hong Sheng a.k.a. Xiao Gui before her career started. Xiao Gui was her 1st boyfriend.

Kelly Lin and Ken Zhu from F4 or JVKV are currently dating.

Edison Chen dated BoBo Chan in the past and broke up. They both left the Hong Kong entertainment industry due to the highly publicized sex scandal. Edison Chen and Vincy Yeung, the neice of EEG boss, Albert Yeung have broken up too and BoBo Chan might marry Phillip Kam. Heard that she's having relationship problems with him.

Michelle Reis and her husband, Julian Hui.

Kathy Chow and Alex To broke up. Kathy Chow is a Hong Kong model and older sister of Niki Chow. Alex To was born and raised in Hong Kong to a Filipino father and a Shanghainese mother.

Patrick Tse was previously married to Deborah Li. They are now divorced. He's currently dating Coco who is the same age as his daughter.

Lee San San and Chin Ka Lok - broken up.

Chin Ka Lok is the one on the top left. He is the younger brother of Chin Siu Ho.

Sonija Kwok and Deric Wan dated in the past and broke up. An article from jaynestars that confirmed that Sonija Kwok broke up with Deric Wan.

Niki Chow and Kevin Cheng are a rumored couple:

Fiona Sit and Jaycee Chan are a rumored couple. Jaycee Chan is the son of Jackie Chan.

Khalil Fong is Fiona Sit's other rumored boyfriend.

Bernice Liu and Moses Chan were rumored to have broken up.

Eason Chan and Hilary Tsui are married and have a daughter name Constance.

Alex Fong and Stephy Tang are a rumored couple.

Ekin Cheng's ex-girlfriends, Maggie Siu and Gigi Leung:

Maggie Siu:

Gigi Leung:

Josie Ho Chiu-Yi (Chinese: 何超儀; born December 26, 1974) is a singer and actor from Hong Kong. She is the daughter of the famous entrepreneur Stanley Ho and wife of Alive band member and actor Conroy Chan Chi-Chung.

Hong Kong actress Isabella Leong is in relationship with Richard Lee, one of the richest bachelor in Hong Kong with a networth of 1.2 billion US Dollars. She gave birth to a baby boy.

Isabella, 21, and Richard, 43, is said to be in relationship after being introduced with each other by international star Michelle Yeoh while both the actress were filming “Mummy 3?.

Vivian Yeo and Eric Suen are a rumored couple.

Ethan Ruan and Tiffany Hsu are currently dating.

Jack Wu and June Chan are currently married. They are soon to become parents!

William Chan and Angelababy Yeung are a rumored couple.

Jordan Chan and Cherie Ying are currently dating.

Anita Lee and Francis Ng - broken up.

There are others I know:

Aaron Kwok and Lynne Xiong - rumored couple

Vivian Chow and Joe Ngai - married couple

Maple Hui and Jimmy Wong - married couple

Liu Kai Ji and Chan Man Yee - married couple

Claire Yiu is married to former ATV actor, Thomas Lam. They have a daughter name Kyra.

Patrick Tam and Astrid Chan - broken up

Angie Chiu and husband, Melvin Wong who is an actor turned lawyer.

Alex Man Tze Leung was married to actress Tien Niu, but they were divorced in 1996.
